name: pieplant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an informal name for
rhubarb : My aunt sent me out to cut some fresh stalks of pieplant. There are lots of great ways to cook pieplant.
More examplesFewer examplesPieplant is a great favourite of mine and also of my husband.Rhubarb is called the “pie plant” because its most popular use is as a pie filling.My family used to grow pieplant, which we used to make pies and crumbles.
